text:
Chart a course through the charmed world of 'Rose des Vents' jewelry by Victoire de Castellane https://t.co/pn6yrg0EPL as the colorful medallions lead Cara Delevingne, the face of #DiorJoaillerie, on a merry adventure.
© Caroline Gaimari https://t.co/ZANz6YM4gk

The new Beachwear capsule https://t.co/w0gbkVgYkK from #DiorMenFall 2021 by Kim Jones evokes the textures and light of the coast in knits and white 'Dior Atlas' sandals, and in #DiorOblique as a 'Crossbody Backpack', engraved water bottle and 'CD Link S1U' sunglasses. https://t.co/o064laWzSW

Colors and styles evocative of maritime idylls punctuate the new Beachwear capsule https://t.co/w0gbkVgYkK from #DiorMenFall 2021 by Kim Jones, updating the iconic #DiorOblique motif on pieces including towels, 'Dior Paradise' espadrilles and a 'Crossbody Backpack'.

Embrace summer escapism with the Beachwear capsule https://t.co/w0gbkVgYkK by Kim Jones in collaboration with Kenny Scharf, from soft separates and sporty shorts to 'Dior Atlas' sandals, 'CD Link' sunglasses and #DiorOblique bathrobes, water bottle and crossbody backpacks. https://t.co/BkVz9CZSHZ

Discover the men's Beachwear capsule https://t.co/w0gbkVgYkK for #DiorMenFall 2021 by Kim Jones. An ode to the colors and styles of summer escapism, the new line includes iterations of the #DiorOblique motifs in the form of a terry cotton bathrobe, towel and #DiorSaddle tote. https://t.co/hQn39Za3Sg

Adorn your eyes with Dior! The new Diorshow Maximizer 3D primer-serum followed by the Diorshow Iconic Overcurl creates oversized black lashes for a standout look. The new Diorshow Maximizer 3D boosts radically volume, definition and curl for 24 hours.
#diormakeup #diorshow https://t.co/xiLcoHrglf

Seamless nudes, luminous corals, fresh pinks, and deep smoky hues constitute a palette of 21 highly desirable shades. These shades offer 5 new finishes with spectacular results thanks to rich, long last pigments.
#diormakeup #diorshow https://t.co/rTWA46DdfW

Singer-songwriter @Olivia_Rodrigo took to the @BRITs Awards stage in custom #DiorCouture by Maria Grazia Chiuri. See some of the #DiorSavoirFaire behind her sensational red chiffon dress and sequined tulle bra and panties.
© John Marshall and Sophie Carre https://t.co/z2fX9IAAiO

Singer-songwriter @Olivia_Rodrigo lit up the red carpet at the 2021 @BRITs Awards ceremony in London in a #DiorFall21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri fluorescent tulle dress. See some of its #DiorSavoirFaire and stay tuned for more on the night.
© John Marshall and Sophie Carre https://t.co/QQ6uQq7lM3

“I composed Eden-Roc by imagining myself arriving at the hotel by sea. The salt, sun, pale rocks, and lush vegetation… This fragrance is a scented reflection of the Cap d’Antibes’ exceptional location.”
– François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator https://t.co/1KhbUOamDO

Discover Eden-Roc, the new fragrance from La Collection Privée. The intensely sun-filled scent composed by Dior's Parfumer-Creator, François Demachy, celebrates the French Riviera's most legendary palace.
Discover more https://t.co/lb5Xo1FowQ https://t.co/Hj1M65QQ17

The Eden-Roc fragrance showcases three colors: blue – for the sea bordering the cape, yellow – for the sun shining over the white rocks, and green – for the Mediterranean pines. https://t.co/iyckzaFliI

The finished #DiorBarJacket from #DiorFall21 https://t.co/fakRObqL3K by Maria Grazia Chiuri, with its special leopard warp-print referencing Mizza Bricard, Monsieur Dior's muse, illustrates how #DiorSavoirFaire is at the forefront of evolution and innovation.
© Sophie Carre

Uncover the #DiorSavoirFaire processes behind the new, unlined iteration of the #DiorBarJacket in a special leopard warp-print inspired by Mizza Bricard, Monsieur Dior's muse, with complex weaving techniques followed by precision cutting and construction in the atelier.

Symbolic of the New Look, the #DiorBarJacket is reborn for #DiorFall21 https://t.co/fakROb9acc by Maria Grazia Chiuri in a leopard warp-print inspired by Monsieur Dior's muse, Mizza Bricard. Stay tuned for more on its #DiorSavoirFaire.
© Photos: Sophie Carre & Valentin Hennequin https://t.co/6SSZANN4dD

Channel the alluring aura of Mizza Bricard, muse to Monsieur Dior and inspiration for the #DiorFall21 https://t.co/fakROb9acc by Maria Grazia Chiuri leopard motifs, with new #DiorSignature sunglasses, from pilot to square with gold-finish 'Christian Dior' detailing.
© Maripol https://t.co/IdbTCxrn9i

Inspired by Mizza Bricard, Monsieur Dior's muse, the #DiorFall21 collection https://t.co/fakRObqL3K by Maria Grazia Chiuri purrs with a mesmerizing embrace of leopard motifs, popping up everywhere from a featherlight #DiorBarJacket to the #LadyDLite and #DiorSaddle.
© Maripol https://t.co/X5f21bKazX

Get the look of Monsieur Dior's leopard-loving muse, Mizza Bricard, in the wealth of feline motifs gracing #DiorFall21 https://t.co/fakRObqL3K by Maria Grazia Chiuri, from a printed blouse to embroidered #DiorSaddle bag and unerringly elegant 'Mizza' slingback flats.
© Maripol

Fall in love with #DiorFall21 collection https://t.co/fakROb9acc by Maria Grazia Chiuri, mixing heritage and humor through a Pop prism in the teaming of a short 'Check'N'Dior' suit with a "J'aime Paris" tee, its heart motif echoed on a #LadyDior, scarf and tights.  
© Maripol https://t.co/UrD9tcZgp4

The 'I Love Paris' capsule adds even more appeal to #DiorFall21 collection by Maria Grazia Chiuri https://t.co/fakROb9acc with miniature heart motifs speckling such choice accessories as a Medium #LadyDior bag and the ever-adaptable 'Mitzah' skinny scarf.
© Maripol https://t.co/pExkgMpoVG

Discover the video campaign for #DiorFall21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri https://t.co/fakROb9acc as shot by House collaborator Maripol in her distinctive Polaroid style, underscoring the exuberant energy that emanates from the collection's dazzling designs. https://t.co/UKh5ESmOyY

Kenny Scharf's world meets the House's creativity in #DiorMenFall 2021 https://t.co/zOjEjT2DiX by Kim Jones, imbuing pieces from embroidered berets to logo earrings and 'CD Link' sunglasses.
© Photos: Rafael Pavarotti
DIOR | Artwork © Kenny Scharf. Licensed by Artestar, New York. https://t.co/U5fqHkCIWN

Urban wardrobe building blocks, tailored outerwear and jersey layers prove unmissable elements of #DiorMenFall 2021 https://t.co/zOjEjTkeav by Kim Jones featuring the artwork of Kenny Scharf.
© Photo: Rafael Pavarotti
DIOR | Artwork © Kenny Scharf. Licensed by Artestar, New York.

A shirt, belt and #DiorSaddle pop with imagery by Kenny Scharf for #DiorMenFall 2021 https://t.co/f2Hg2D8KVu by Kim Jones, the effect subtly reprised on a 'Dior Lock' bag with #DiorOblique.
© Photos: Rafael Pavarotti
DIOR | Artwork © Kenny Scharf. Licensed by Artestar, New York. https://t.co/iDEs8ZzfIJ

A blue 'Saddle Soft' and black leather 'Dior Lock' up the bag game of #DiorMenFall 2021 https://t.co/zOjEjTkeav by Kim Jones, accentuating elegant 'Tailleur Oblique' and double-layer coat. 
© Photo: Rafael Pavarotti
DIOR | Artwork © Kenny Scharf. Licensed by Artestar, New York.

Kenny Scharf's aesthetic jolts #DiorMenFall 2021 https://t.co/f2Hg2D8KVu by Kim Jones, from berets to a juicy pink 'Saddle Soft' bag, contrasted by #DiorOblique slippers and 'B28' sneakers.
© Photos: Rafael Pavarotti
DIOR | Artwork © Kenny Scharf. Licensed by Artestar, New York. https://t.co/EOTXSzvyFc

The campaign video for #DiorMenFall 2021 https://t.co/zOjEjT2DiX by Kim Jones spotlights the collaboration with Kenny Scharf whose graffiti-style aesthetic joins standout footwear such as 'Dior Explorer II' boots and #DiorOblique slippers and socks.
© Video: Jason Yan Francis https://t.co/cvMWLD1OiG

Introducing #DiorMenFall 2021 https://t.co/zOjEjT2DiX by Kim Jones created in collaboration with artist Kenny Scharf whose oeuvre appears in unmissable motifs and high-octane embroideries.
© Photos: Rafael Pavarotti
DIOR | Artwork © Kenny Scharf. Licensed by Artestar, New York. https://t.co/r3Ru52lPQN

Acclaimed by women around the world, the iconic color-enhancing lip balm from the House of Dior is reinvented in a new formula containing 97% natural-origin ingredients with the same iconic color reviving technology.
#diormakeup #diorlipglow #timetoglow https://t.co/xodnzxNVYD

Discover the new playful campaign of Dior Addict Lip Glow. It’s time to glow with the No. 1 color reviving lip balm. 
#diormakeup #diorlipglow #timetoglow https://t.co/aNyWDKR27g

Christian Dior used his favorite flower, the Lily-of-the-Valley, in many creations from dresses to fragrances.
Wear the abundantly fresh scent of these white flowers when you’re in need of such luck.
Discover more https://t.co/idqceTDxHn https://t.co/7LWoTgLJmq

Introducing A.B.C.Dior, a podcast series https://t.co/euGXl0pU2O that deciphers House codes and icons one letter at a time. Starting with M for Muguet (Lily of the Valley), explore the importance of this lucky flower to Monsieur Dior on the day it's fêted in France.
#DiorStories

Discover the #DiorMaison 'New Lily of the Valley' collection by Cordelia de Castellane and explore https://t.co/wUmwoNbXRg the delicate motifs of Monsieur Dior's favorite flower and talisman poised on fine Limoges porcelain plates, hand-painted glassware, and more.

Cordelia de Castellane invites us to her country house and demonstrates https://t.co/GjJtU9IezK how to create two seemingly effortless springtime table settings with the 'New Lily of the Valley' collection reminiscent of Monsieur Dior's favorite flowers and precious talismans. https://t.co/sRZaQwbNWj

Cordelia de Castellane's 'New Lily of the Valley' collection honors Monsieur Dior's floral lucky charms as she shows us two dreamy springtime table dressings. Stay tuned https://t.co/GjJtU9IezK to discover her creations in time for May 1 celebrations. https://t.co/tQfmm8yASg

The new #DiorSignature sunglasses from #DiorEyewear bring graceful polish with a delicate gold-finish to #DiorFall21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri https://t.co/fakROb9acc. Shapes are distinctive and alluring and feature a 'Christian Dior' signature on the arms. 
© Brigitte Niedermair https://t.co/nLWVvwNmok

A modern leopard-print roars for #DiorFall21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri https://t.co/fakROb9acc. Inspired by Monsieur Dior's muse from the 1950s, Mizza Bricard, the motif takes shape on a series of creations including the #DiorBookTote and 'Mizza' ballerinas.
© Brigitte Niedermair https://t.co/VIz8N3i5OH

Paying homage to Monsieur Dior's muse Mizza Bricard, a lively leopard print shines on pieces from #DiorFall21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri https://t.co/fakRObqL3K. House icons including the #LadyDior bag and #DiorBarJacket bridge retro charm with modern edge.
© Brigitte Niedermair

#StarsinDior Liu Yuxin wears two looks from #DiorFall21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri featuring the 'Pop Mizza' raincoat, 'Dior Spatial' t-shirt, and a dazzling pop rendition of the #JAdior earrings. The second tie-dye denim look is harmonized by the crocheted #DiorCaro bag. https://t.co/EraNod8t62

Seen here in pared-down pilot form with gold detailing and 'Christian Dior' embossing, the #DiorSignature sunglasses from #DiorFall21 https://t.co/fakROb9acc by Maria Grazia Chiuri summon the elegance of Mizza Bricard, Monsieur Dior's muse.
© Brigitte Niedermair

For #DiorFall21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri https://t.co/fakROb9acc, innovation and heritage converge with pop art influences and vibrant optimism. Metallic silver leather pieces offer a directional take on ladylike style with futuristic vitality.
© Brigitte Niedermair https://t.co/vv56Evy53Y

The #DiorFall21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri https://t.co/fakRObqL3K refreshes iconic motifs with ultra modernity. 'CD' initials adorn rings, while pink leopard and gemstone rings with stars champion House codes with sparkling results.
© Brigitte Niedermair

Reinventing icons with a fresh eye, #DiorFall21 https://t.co/fakROb9acc by Maria Grazia Chiuri introduces the Cannage-quilted #DiorCaro bag in a Medium format and casts the eternal #DiorBarJacket in a new light by unexpectedly pairing it with a utility vest.
© Brigitte Niedermair https://t.co/3XQ402gpi2

From Warhol to Fiorucci, hot color to couture, references and influences joyously collide and clash for #DiorFall21 https://t.co/obozaiHWkI by Maria Grazia Chiuri, but all are ultimately distilled through a prism of supremely Parisian allure.
© Brigitte Niedermair

Glittering long dresses contrast with the low-key luster of the embroidered 'DiorTravel Vanity Case', offering two takes on this most precious of metals in the #DiorGold capsule from #DiorSS21 https://t.co/uEKvWje0QK by Maria Grazia Chiuri. https://t.co/mSD5WNbvu6

The #DiorGold capsule from #DiorSS21 https://t.co/uEKvWje0QK by Maria Grazia Chiuri lights up the urban landscape with its delicate multicolor textures flecked with gold on the medium #LadyDLite as on a 'Dior Palto' jacket, pleated skirt and 'Dway' slides. https://t.co/pUdfGVbuEn

Cinched by a matching belt, this key 'Dior Palto' jacket shape perfectly integrates into the #DiorGold capsule from #DiorSS21 https://t.co/uEKvWje0QK by Maria Grazia Chiuri, with its striated gilt textures echoed in bags such as the embroidered #DiorSaddle. https://t.co/t1b8KTWtN5

The ethereal incandescence of the desert is evoked in the #DiorGold capsule from #DiorSS21 https://t.co/uEKvWje0QK by Maria Grazia Chiuri as airy dresses, and softly glinting textured embroideries on the mini #DiorBookTote, 'DiorTravel Vanity Case' and slippers. https://t.co/Hk5PZYFZDQ

The finely embroidered metallic threads that cover the densely embroidered surface of this medium #LadyDLite from the #DiorGold capsule https://t.co/uEKvWiWpsa from #DiorSS21 by Maria Grazia Chiuri illuminate the ongoing evolution of this must-have bag.

The rarefied allure of the #DiorGold capsule from #DiorSS21 https://t.co/uEKvWje0QK by Maria Grazia Chiuri is expressed through tonal embroideries on bags such as the #DiorCaro, mini #DiorBookTote and 'DiorTravel Vanity Case', as well as a pair of matching mules. https://t.co/mOW6IQlJko

The desert setting highlights the escapist air of the #DiorGold capsule from #DiorSS21 https://t.co/uEKvWje0QK by Maria Grazia Chiuri, the muted redefining of the precious metal glinting on a flowing dress and the embroidery of a #DiorCaro with 'CD' twist clasp. https://t.co/EKJ7RPxlST

'Sound of Metal' screenwriting nominees @DariusMarder and @AbeMarder (Abraham Marder), actor Ashton Sanders, and 'The Father' nominated film editor Yorgos Lamprinos all wore Dior men's tailored evening looks by Kim Jones for the 93rd @TheAcademy Awards.
#StarsinDior https://t.co/duPrBCTSbT

Musician @JonBatiste, winning Best Original Score for 'Soul', and director @OssMedia (Erick Oh), nominated in the Best Animated Short Film category, attended the 93rd @TheAcademy Awards ceremony in Dior men's evening looks by Kim Jones.
#StarsinDior https://t.co/YobCGyAsIr

Winning Best Adapted Screenplay for 'The Father' at the 93rd @TheAcademy Awards, Florian Zeller, attending virtually from Paris, wore a Dior men's black peak lapel tuxedo, white cotton shirt, black silk bow tie and black patent leather shoes by Kim Jones.
#StarsinDior https://t.co/VN41c3HQjP

Winning the Oscar for Best Documentary Short for 'Colette' at the 93rd @TheAcademy Awards, producer @AliceDoyard, pictured with director @AntGiacchino, wore a softly draped #DiorCruise 2021 pink silk chiffon dress and Dior shoes by Maria Grazia Chiuri.
#StarsinDior https://t.co/SuTeK5Zpsm

A Best Actress in a Supporting Role nominee for her performance in 'The Father', Olivia Colman attended the 93rd @TheAcademy Awards ceremony in a #DiorCouture red silk crêpe dress by Maria Grazia Chiuri. Discover the #DiorSavoirFaire behind this special creation. https://t.co/V93T1CfAfr

A 93rd @TheAcademy Awards nominee, actress Olivia Colman attended the ceremony in a #DiorCouture red silk crêpe dress by Maria Grazia Chiuri and wearing @DiorMakeup. See inside the atelier where some of the #DiorSavoirFaire that went into its creation is revealed.
#StarsinDior https://t.co/Rm42I3doFZ

Attending the 93rd @TheAcademy Awards virtually from Sydney, Australia, actress Isla Fisher wore a #DiorAW21 black wool and silk full-skirted dress by Maria Grazia Chiuri.
#StarsinDior https://t.co/kwCLZFawZS

Actress and producer @ReeseW, a presenter at the 93rd @TheAcademy Awards, attended the ceremony wearing a #DiorAW21 red silk georgette draped and pleated dress accented with a black leather and gold belt by Maria Grazia Chiuri.
#StarsinDior https://t.co/hysQC2pJS4

Julia Sullivan is committed about raising awareness to combat plastic pollution in the ocean, and tries to help the local population access drinking water – the basis of all balance.
Directed by Clément Beauvais. https://t.co/G3eeG3SyNL

In 2021, for Earth Day, Tales of the Wild takes you into the heart of British Columbia’s forests, in Canada, where the biologist Wes Larson leads the harsh life of a Jack London hero to observe grizzlys.
Directed by Clément Beauvais. https://t.co/RCu5Xwp9xO

Celebrate Earth Day by discovering Tales of the Wild. Two portraits of committed guardians, determined to find symbiosis between the world of wildlife and mankind. 
Directed by Clément Beauvais et Arthur de Kersauson https://t.co/2Ln2hssCj1

See how digital entrepreneur @AimeeSong starts her perfect day with breakfast served on the 'Toile de Jouy Rouge' series imagined by Maria Grazia Chiuri. Discover more from #DiorMaison universe https://t.co/GjJtU9IezK. https://t.co/FnAJ71Ht4s

Digital entrepreneur @AimeeSong takes her breakfast with #DiorMaison as she harmonizes her table with the elegant yet edgy 'Toile de Jouy Rouge' printed tableware. Step into the Dior Maison universe and discover l'art de vivre https://t.co/GjJtU9IezK. https://t.co/n19zv7U4at

Unfolding across the pages of #DiorMagazine 33, a hazily romantic editorial by photographer Sarah Moon captures the femininity of the #DiorSS21 https://t.co/RxGwdTeB3L by Maria Grazia Chiuri. Made in Italy, some of the pieces are embellished with traditional Endek Bali Indonesia. https://t.co/VfkJeh9ZdK

An airy 'Dior Jardin' motif dress and 'D-Bubble' bucket bag from #DiorSS21 https://t.co/RxGwdTeB3L by Maria Grazia Chiuri are delicately depicted by illustrator Mats Gustafson for #DiorMagazine 33. Made in Italy, the bag is embellished with traditional Endek Bali Indonesia. https://t.co/qgb1efrlQe

The organic asymmetry of #GemDior by Victoire de Castellane is highlighted in images by Nicholas Alan Cope for #DiorMagazine 33. Inspired by minerals and Monsieur Dior's couture swatches, #DiorJoaillerie and #DiorHorlogerie combine in gold, colorful hardstones and diamonds. https://t.co/nvB5ss6Kg5

Highlighting the art and fashion fusion that has shaped the House's history, model Malick Bodian photographs himself for #DiorMagazine 33 wearing #DiorSummer21 by Kim Jones in collaboration with artist @AmoakoBoafo whose colors and motifs are translated on a beret and shirt.

The colors, motifs and fresh proportions of #DiorSummer21 by Kim Jones in collaboration with Ghanaian artist @AmoakoBoafo are captured for #DiorMagazine 33 by model Malick Bodian who photographed the collection on himself in a creative solution to lockdown restrictions. https://t.co/EzCA2vLeMp

Wearing a #DiorHauteCouture Autumn-Winter 2018-2019 double-layer dress, @BAFTA winner Youn Yuh-jung was joined by @ReginaKing, @AmandaSeyfried and @Smashleybell as actresses and directors donning creations by Maria Grazia Chiuri for recent ceremonies and appearances. https://t.co/mFgLPsZaXl

Attending the 2021 @LatinAMAs, singer @Ricky_Martin wore a white wool coat, multicolor 'Dior and Kenny Scharf' print silk shirt, blue wool trousers, 'Dior and Kenny Scharf' earring and 'Dior Explorer' boots, all from the #DiorMenFall 2021 collection by Kim Jones. https://t.co/woKjVrDAnK

A mix of winners, nominees and presenters at the 74th @BAFTA Awards in London, directors Remi Weekes and @LadjLy and actors Chiwetel Ejiofor and Kingsley Ben-Adir were all dressed for the occasion in Dior men's looks by Kim Jones. https://t.co/2QcsZYFLSa

An instant icon with its embroidered #DiorOblique motif and characteristic 'Christian Dior' signature band, the #DiorBookTote https://t.co/jACinGQnKz by Maria Grazia Chiuri elegantly melds a flawless #DiorSavoirFaire conception with impeccable proportions.
© PolBaril

Uncover the steps required to make a #DiorBookTote https://t.co/jACinGQnKz by Maria Grazia Chiuri, as the #DiorOblique and 'Christian Dior' motifs are embroidered in tiny stitches and the artisans' #DiorSavoirFaire shapes and assembles the elements into a perfect bag.
© PolBaril https://t.co/cCteqocKff

Having started its story as a studio sketch, the #DiorBookTote https://t.co/jACinGQnKz by Maria Grazia Chiuri has been transformed through a process of intricate #DiorSavoirFaire into a modern icon, its #DiorOblique motif embroidered in millions of tiny stitches.
© PolBaril https://t.co/Q6tovbZIcH

Capturing the world's attention with her reading at the @POTUS inauguration, National Youth Poet Laureate @TheAmandaGorman was photographed by @AnnieLeibovitz for the May @VogueMagazine cover and features in a #DiorCouture Spring-Summer 2021 lace dress by Maria Grazia Chiuri. https://t.co/2VhC6QkkBv

Supermodel and environmentalist @GiseleOfficial is photographed by Kevin O'Brien for the triple-cover Vogue Hong Kong Sustainability-themed April issue wearing #DiorSS21 https://t.co/RxGwdTwbVj by Maria Grazia Chiuri, including 'Dior Jardin' knits and a 'Dior Palto' jacket. https://t.co/BuFZtOR6vZ

For the Dior Fall 2021 Collection, Peter Philips, Creative & Image Director of Dior Makeup, created a strong look by applying an intense black graphic eyeliner under the eyes, the skin was kept natural and the lips were hydrated and dewy. #diormakeup #diorbackstage #DiorFall21 https://t.co/dl939ib1jo

Encapsulating the collection's mix of Pop and disco themes, and its upbeat energy, the final four looks taking to the runway in the Shanghai unveiling of #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 by Maria Grazia Chiuri spelled out 'D-I-O-R' in colorful sequins. https://t.co/jJxMtBI1xJ

Stroboscopic sequins in blue and red - the latter exclusive debuting in the Shanghai show - channel the decadent nightlife aesthetic of the disco era that proved such a powerful theme of the #DiorFall21 collection https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 by Maria Grazia Chiuri. https://t.co/rqjCtZj7Hy

With international travel restrictions hobbling preparations for the Shanghai unveiling of #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 by Maria Grazia Chiuri, see how the teams digitally collaborated across the globe to make the show happen. https://t.co/BmgbqqJ2Yq

Highly evocative of the collection's disco inspirations, two pleated and flaring fluorescent pink and green dresses from #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 by Maria Grazia Chiuri were among the exclusive designs unveiled in Monday's show in Shanghai, China. https://t.co/eu8xlVTvR2

Maria Grazia Chiuri decided on the styling of leopard motif looks during final fittings before the #DiorFall21 collection https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 was sent to Shanghai for the show that would be digitally directed in precise detail by the team located in Paris. https://t.co/NTyeHnWxNI

Building on Monsieur Dior's couture adoption of menswear fabrics, for #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 shown Monday in Shanghai, Maria Grazia Chiuri used 'Check'N'Dior' weaves in tangy and classic hues for youthful tailoring accessorized with #DiorBookTote and #DiorCaro bags. https://t.co/B0bZtZBpWu

Guests at the #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 show from Maria Grazia Chiuri at the Long Museum West Bund, Shanghai, were asked "What is Pop?". Whether futuristic or keeping classical, their answers reflect the diversity of the collection's inspirations.
#StarsinDior https://t.co/DY7y1a6eLd

The fashion jewelry for #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 by Maria Grazia Chiuri keeps to the collection's themes, including #DiorOblique earrings embellished with a bird and cursive 'Dior', 'CD' rings in resin and rhinestones, and cameo rings featuring prowling leopards. https://t.co/waKcTqE4vQ

Kooky pop culture-referencing green dragon motifs punctuate fiery orange looks in the #DiorFall21 collection https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 by Maria Grazia Chiuri unveiled Monday in Shanghai, illuminating youthful separates and embroidered on #DiorBookTote and #LadyDLite bags. https://t.co/yrAK9Eddlx

With performances by singer Joey Yung and rockers Black Panther, the #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 by Maria Grazia Chiuri post-show party perpetuated the collection's nightlife theme. The events were held in accordance with the relevant health and safety guidelines. https://t.co/ArDwsDKJiT

Among the #StarsinDior attending the Shanghai show and party for #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 by Maria Grazia Chiuri were actresses Zhang Ziyi and Carina Lau and models Ming Xi and He Sui. The events were held in accordance with the relevant health and safety guidelines. https://t.co/VMaiHlUEL7

Joey Yung attended the #DiorFall21 https://t.co/0keMc6bpm8 show in a #DiorSS21 dress with #DiorCaro bag, singing at the party after in a dress from the new collection by Maria Grazia Chiuri. The events were held in accordance with the relevant health and safety guidelines. https://t.co/A4J2d9tCdX

Re-experience the finale of the Shanghai show for the #DiorFall21 collection https://t.co/0keMc5TNXy by Maria Grazia Chiuri, encapsulating this upbeat ode to Pop culture, House heritage and the fun to be found in fashion.

Seen backstage, the four final looks in the #DiorFall21 show https://t.co/fakROb9acc from Maria Grazia Chiuri featured twinkling tops and corresponding #LadyDior bags covered in stroboscopic sequins that together spelled out 'D-I-O-R'. https://t.co/4MHtaZH1fO
